Entries.default: "Isn't this charming."
"Well, no welcome's better than a bad one."
"There's a point when architecture is just plain evil."
"We may be the first kith in centuries to set foot in this place. Hopefully we will live to tell someone about it."
"Could we not sail somewhere cooler?"
"This where Gaun stormed through? Least the docks are still intact."
"Your instincts were right, Watcher."
"All right. All right. We're gonna do this."
"I'll take aim at his nose. You go for his ankles."
"Is that... is that really Eothas? I thought the descriptions were exaggerations."
"Wael's. Hidden. Fiddly bits... That be one vastgantuan cocksucker."
"I've changed my mind. I would like to return to the ship."
"Good Gaun! He's even bigger than I dreamed!"
"Ishi, now is the chance if you had any second thoughts about this place."
"Watch your footing, kids. Excepting if you can fly."
"What a glorious hole."
"Reckon this is what happens when you try to keep a god from enacting his plans."
"You spend your whole life thinking you're a giant. Then one day that fella shows up at your fortress."
"Bet you wish Caed Nua was this big."
"How old is this fortress? It is incredible that it even exists in this place."
"Aye, let's be building our huge fucking fortress inside a volcano. Right fine plan."
"That was awfully profound."
"A whole archipelago to explore and we end up here."
"I could have gone my entire life without ever seeing a dragon. Should I be thankful or spiteful that you always head straight for them?"
"For a place filled with flames, it's awfully dark in here."
"Fye, 'tis a right foul stench!"
"That smell... Hope it's just their cook, burning the meat."
"Ishi, don't let your feathers catch."
"I think that were a person, cap. That, too."
"This place smells and feels like Hel in the stories Uncle Angbert used to tell me to make me behave as a child..."
"Ain't she a beauty."
"If it has survived this long near the keep, we may be able to reason with it."
"Magran's fiery flaps. That be a flogging dragon, that be."
"I never saw such creatures before joining your crew."
"If that ain't a creature born of my nightmares... I don't know what is."
"Who's right-primed for a bashing?"
"Ishi, now is not the time to start molting. I'm stressed too."
"What are these giants preparing to do? Attack Eothas? They will die to the last."
"A whole mess of fire beards up there, all with their pointiest bits."
"Can we not reason with the gigantic, flaming marauders?"
"Tell me we aren't going to fight them all at once. Better yet, what if we didn't fight them at all..."
"Always seemed real cold to me for a fire god. Like she'd rather see you die struggling than offer help."
"Wonder if she has a shorter sister."
"I wonder what she thinks of all this, seeing her creations snuffed out as easily as a candle's flame. Does she feel anything at all?"
"Like her eyes be following you."
"This would brighten up my quarters in the guild."
"I can see the fury burning in her eyes. What a hateful goddess."
"At least this means they're all dead. Right?"
"Guess everybody slept in."
"Nothing good comes from this much quiet."
"It is so quiet. How many has Eothas killed passing through here?"
"Know any good drinking songs?"
"Must every room be so hot?"
"Did Eothas do this?"
"If we have to make some kind of stand, this doesn't look like the place."
"You're telling me this place was welcoming before Eothas showed up?"
"You ain't leading us into certain death, are you captain?"
"Is it too late to discuss my fear of heights?"
"They're with Gaun now."
"...You're certain he wanted us all to come?"
"Do- Do we tap him on the shoulder? I don't wanna startle him."
"Now's not the time to have any sore feelings about your smashed castle."
"I wish my diplomatic training included the polite way to get a god's attention."
"Aye, he be big from down here, too."
"Smaller than I expected."
"Have you ever seen anything so awe-inspiring? Behold the power of my god!"
"This isn't good."
"I'm gonna miss the outside world."
"I didn't like that exit anyway."
"Merla! At least it was not on our heads. We will need to find another way out."
"And here with me thinking the whole point of the land be that it stays fucking put."
"Oh, gods, we're trapped!"
